original_text: This servant cannot work for me any longer. Take him outside and throw him into a dark place. There, people will cry and they will bite their teeth together.” ’
korean_text: 이 무익한 종을 바깥 어두운 데로 내쫓으라 거기서 슬피 울며 이를 갈리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: This servant cannot work for me any longer
sentences.korean_translation: 이 종은 더 이상 나를 위해 일할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: and throw him into a dark place
and they will bite their teeth together
